content.question: At how many points on the curve <math alttext="x raised to the two thirds power, plus y raised to the two thirds power, equals 9" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-plane does the curve have a tangent line that is horizontal?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
